forum.name: T3D3 Discussion: Your LINCS Discussion Groups
forum.intro:
Share your experiences with LINCS Discussion groups.

Please share about your LINCS discussion group(s) with peers, addressing one of the following questions:

  • If you have just become a member of the LINCS Community, please share with peers which discussion group(s) you joined and why. 
  • If you were already are a member of the LINCS Community, please share with peers which discussion group(s) you are a member of and how you benefit from membership.

After you post, please take time to review others’ posted responses and post at least one reply in response.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
